name: MPMediaPropertyPredicate
desc: A set of predicates for defining a filter in a media query.

items.name: init(value: Any?, forProperty: String)
items.desc: Creates a media property predicate with the default comparison type.

items.name: init(value: Any?, forProperty: String, comparisonType: MPMediaPredicateComparison)
items.desc: Creates a media property predicate with a specified comparison type.

items.name: var property: String
items.desc: The property that the media property predicate uses when you invoke a query.

items.name: var value: Any?
items.desc: The value that the media property predicate matches against when you invoke a query.

items.name: var comparisonType: MPMediaPredicateComparison
items.desc: The type of matching comparison that the media property predicate performs when you invoke a query.

items.name: enum MPMediaPredicateComparison
items.desc: Logical comparison types for media queries.
